about_the_game:
Assemble is a gridless physics-based VR sandbox game. Glue, snap, and pivot to build mechanisms that function how they would in real life. Construct a working vehicle and then drive in it. Create weapons and test them out in live combat. Or create a new wacky mechanism. The only limit is your imagination! The game is currently in Closed Beta, and not all features are implemented. This Beta is to gain feedback to make each subsystem robust.

Feedback:
Join our Discord to share your designs and give us feedback: https://discord.gg/P3pN5WvJek.

Gameplay:
Use your hands to grab and assemble parts. When parts are moved close together, suggestions for where to place the part will appear. Let go to attach the part. Attach two parts how you normally would in real life:
- Align two faces together to stick them together.
- Attach two holes together to have the part pivot around the hole.
- Combine multiple attachments to make the part stick, slide, and pivot around the assembly.

Features (current):
- Assemble unlimited number of designs
- Share your designs via Discord
- Shape the future of the game via Discord
- Attach and detach parts
- Spare part cleanup
- Undo and redo changes

Features (planned):
- Share your designs instantly
- Play with up to 5 friends in a room
- Physics playground
- Gears, motors, and springs
- Vehicle controller
- Buildable avatars

Content:
- 100s of part types
- 40 unique materials
- Space station environment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), or newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core, or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), or newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core, or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: Assemble is a creative sandbox VR game. Build anything and everything. Glue, snap, and pivot to make things that function like in real life. Share your creations with your friends. Easily bring your imagination to life.
